text: Night presses down, the firelight from the hearth stretching the shadows long.
I promised myself I wouldn’t go out, but the quieter it gets, the more it feels like something is closing in—I can’t sit still.
Lucia rushes in, her voice trembling. “Innkeeper! The mentor is gone!”
“Where did she go?”
“She suddenly put on her cloak and left… just said ‘Don’t follow.’ I also heard her mention the Echo Assembly.”
I don’t ask more. Those three words are enough for me to grab my short sword.
“Let’s go. If she told you not to follow, then you follow me.”
Fog and snow knead the streets into a blur as we chase toward the northern district.
The closer we get to Scrap Iron Alley, the quieter it becomes—unnaturally quiet.
The sounds that should have been there never come, as if someone has already written the ending.
From the shadows at the alley’s mouth, Alicia steps out. The edge of her cloak is scorched, and there’s blood on her gloves.
“…What a hassle.”
“Mentor! Are you okay?!”
“You went in already?”
“Mm.”
“Don’t stand here.”
She opens her palm—a ring-shaped token rests there. When she closes her hand again, it’s quick, like she’d be annoyed if she looked at it any longer.
She pushes open the rusted door. We follow her down.
The formation hasn’t fully faded. Black-robed figures lie scattered across the floor. No chanting, no struggle—like a paragraph cut cleanly in one stroke.
“You dealt with them…”
“Handled.”
“Why didn’t you call us?”
She glances at me, her tone even. “Because you’d be in the way. And I already know how to deal with them. No need to worry.”
Lucia bites her lip but still adjusts Alicia’s cloak quietly, shielding her from the draft.
“Your hands are shaking… you’re forcing it again.”
Alicia doesn’t deny it. She just slips the token back inside her clothes.
“We’re leaving.”
“Leave this place. I’ll need it again tomorrow.”

options.text: Option A: Press her—“Where exactly is this? Why do you seem so familiar with it?” [charisma Check (INS DC 13)]
Option B: Stop pressing and escort them back to the inn first [No Check (DC 0)]
Option C: Make an excuse to stay and observe the surroundings [intellgent Check (PER DC 12)]
